tool_description: Provides intelligent code completion suggestions based on context, language syntax, and common patterns.

cursor_position.description: Character position where completion is needed

max_suggestions.description: Maximum number of suggestions to return (1-20)

include_snippets.description: Whether to include code snippet suggestions

error_messages: Invalid cursor_position: Position must be within the source code bounds.
Invalid max_suggestions: Must be between 1 and 20.
Unsupported context_scope: Use local, file, or project.
Parsing error: Unable to analyze source code context for suggestions.
usage: Provide source_code, cursor_position, and language. Customize suggestion behavior with max_suggestions, include_snippets, and context_scope.

suggestion_types.description: Types of suggestions (keyword, variable, function, snippet)

context_info.description: Information about the current code context
